subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt is still the Olympic champion at 100 meters, having won in the fastest collective 100-meter race ever with a time of 9.63 seconds.
snippet: Usain Bolt is still the Olympic champion at 100 meters, having won in the fastest collective 100-meter race ever with a time of 9.63 seconds.
